targets.rawSql:
SELECT queryid::TEXT AS qid, d.datname, r.rolname, s.*
FROM pg_stat_statements s
         LEFT JOIN pg_database d ON s.dbid = d.oid
         LEFT JOIN pg_roles r ON s.userid = r.oid
WHERE datname='$datname'
ORDER BY mean_exec_time DESC
LIMIT 100;

panels.description: Users list that runs this query
panels.title: Users

targets.rawSql: SELECT * FROM pg_stat_statements WHERE dbid = (SELECT oid FROM pg_database WHERE datname = '${datname}') AND queryid = '$query' ORDER BY calls DESC LIMIT 1;
SELECT * FROM pg_stat_statements WHERE dbid = (SELECT oid FROM pg_database WHERE datname = '${datname}') AND queryid = '$query' ORDER BY calls DESC LIMIT 1;
SELECT * FROM pg_stat_statements WHERE dbid = (SELECT oid FROM pg_database WHERE datname = '${datname}') AND queryid = '$query' ORDER BY calls DESC LIMIT 1;
SELECT * FROM pg_stat_statements WHERE dbid = (SELECT oid FROM pg_database WHERE datname = '${datname}') AND queryid = '$query' ORDER BY calls DESC LIMIT 1;

options.content: {{ query }}
options.defaultContent: The query didn't return any results.

targets.rawSql: SELECT * FROM pg_stat_statements WHERE dbid = (SELECT oid FROM pg_database WHERE datname = '${datname}') AND queryid = '$query' LIMIT 1;

panels.description:
Queries per second according to 
`pg_stat_statements`.`calls`
in last minute
panels.title: QPS (1m)

panels.description: Average Query Latency according to `pg_stat_statements`: rate of `total_exec_time` / rate of `calls` in last minute

targets.expr:
rate(pg_query_exec_time{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", query="$query"}[1m]) /
 rate(pg_query_calls{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", query="$query"}[1m])

panels.title: RT (1m)

panels.description: It may have multiple records if the same query is executed by multiple different users.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT queryid::TEXT AS qid, d.datname, r.rolname, s.*
FROM pg_stat_statements s
         LEFT JOIN pg_database d ON s.dbid = d.oid
         LEFT JOIN pg_roles r ON s.userid = r.oid
WHERE datname='$datname' and queryid = '$query'
ORDER BY mean_exec_time DESC
LIMIT 100;

panels.title: Statement Detail

panels.description: pg_stat_statements of database ${datname}, order by mean_exec_time DESC.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT queryid::TEXT AS qid, d.datname, r.rolname, s.*
FROM pg_stat_statements s
         LEFT JOIN pg_database d ON s.dbid = d.oid
         LEFT JOIN pg_roles r ON s.userid = r.oid
WHERE datname='$datname'
ORDER BY mean_exec_time DESC
LIMIT 100;

panels.title: Top SQL by RT

list.definition: SELECT distinct queryid::TEXT FROM pg_stat_statements WHERE dbid = (SELECT oid FROM pg_database WHERE datname = '${datname}') AND userid != 10 LIMIT 1000;
list.label: Query
list.name: query
list.query: SELECT distinct queryid::TEXT FROM pg_stat_statements WHERE dbid = (SELECT oid FROM pg_database WHERE datname = '${datname}') AND userid != 10 LIMIT 1000;
